page.title: 18YOUTH CLUB & LADIES NETBALL
page.content:
{Tacolneston Youth Club}opened in 1983 at the Village Hall.It caters for junior members (7_11yrs) & seniors (12_16yrs) & owns a fine collection of apparatus:_ snooker tables,colour TV, & electronic games etc. A summer trip for both members & families,& a winter visit to the Pantomime are annual events. Cash to provide coaches & disco equipment comes from various fundraising events,regular discos are held.
{The thriving Ladies Netball Club}has 13 regular players & a promising Jnr squad. Weekly matches are played against teams drawn from the S.Norfolk area. After much fundraising the hard court was completed this year & to extend the playing season flood_ lighting is being considered.
